https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qSORRh5Lo9xcrcYHgn8mQZjylUy.jpg Corinna Kleist is a juvenile court judge who, after a leave of absence following the suicide of a convicted teenager, is appointed to a 'problem area' in Berlin. She now tries harder than ever to change the system in order to prevent troubled kids from being turned into vicious criminals. Das Ende der Geduld
